b'Alps no Shoujo Heidi': b"After becoming an orphan, Heidi is forced to live with her grandfather \xc3\x96hi, who lives in the Alps. She learns he's a very bitter man who only accepted by force to take her in. But Heidi's kindness may be able to open his heart. Together with the shepherd Peter and invalid Clara, she has lots of adventures.\n\n(Source: adapted from ANN) "
